titleStmt.title: Heaven realized, or, The Holy pleasure of daily intimate communion with God exemplified in a blessed soul (now in Heaven) (Mrs. Sarah Davy) ... being a part of the pretious reliques written with her own hand, (stiled by her) the record of my consolations, and the meditations of my heart / published by A.P.
titleStmt.author: Davy, Sarah.
A. P.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
